__e: He has the worst track record when choosing men, and not just Lloyd and my dad.
She said that she couldn't keep you around because of Lloyd and all and that she wanted me to take you off her hands.
Lloyd George said it better than I can.
Do you know what Lloyd George said of him?
I do wish you weren't so friendly with Lloyd George.
Lloyd, you better get out here... if you want to see something you ain't never going to see again.
